data.lyric:
[ti:All I Got]
[ar:Rod Wave]
[al:SoulFly (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]All I Got - Rod Wave
[00:00.18]Lyrics by：Rodarius Green/Brayon Nelson/John Balan/Nikola Pejovic
[00:00.36]Ayy yo
[00:10.53]Low low turn that up hey
[00:21.72]Look
[00:21.93]Mook got the keys jumpin'
[00:23.13]Uh
[00:23.65]Six in the morning he up fightin' demons
[00:26.05]Lately I ain't got no time for sleepin'
[00:29.38]These n***as hatin' on me for no reason
[00:31.53]I pray I make it back when I be leavin'
[00:34.10]I give it all I got
[00:35.66]Ridin' around in a drophead
[00:37.44]Tell 'em f**k they feelings drop dead
[00:39.50]Go tell 'em I said
[00:40.90]It's f**k the world like my pops said
[00:43.20]It's thug life just like pac said just like pac said
[00:47.08]Thinkin' about my n***a C
[00:49.03]He got a quarter of a century locked in penitentiary
[00:52.65]I ain't gon' lie that s**t be killin' me
[00:54.90]So many memories life'll be gone in 2053
[00:58.56]This s**t gon' stop
[00:59.15]Them n***as spinnin' just like ceiling fans
[01:01.36]Take them extensions off them FNs
[01:03.34]Them b***hes jam
[01:04.40]Told 'em I'll be him now we
[01:05.34]Locked in and I don't give a d**n
[01:07.59]Don't give a d**n
[01:10.90]Say what you gon' say 'bout me I promise
[01:12.55]But don't touch me 'cause them young n***as
[01:13.92]Don't play 'bout me gon' spray 'bout me
[01:16.40]Jump out in broad day 'bout me
[01:18.55]N***a play they gon' lay 'bout me yeah grrah
[01:21.82]Thinkin' about my n***as up the road
[01:24.93]Ridin' with 'em 'til they home
[01:26.33]This here right all I got yeah
[01:28.27]Know I'm with my n***as right or wrong
[01:30.81]Keep it real with all my folks
[01:32.18]You know we all we got
[01:33.62]I'm who they said I wasn't gonna be
[01:36.27]What more do they want from me
[01:37.98]Give it all I got
[01:39.56]Been chasin' since I was seventeen
[01:41.61]Youngin' finally get to live his dream
[01:43.44]I'ma give it all I got yeah
[01:45.83]I'ma give it all I got yeah
[01:47.95]I'ma give it all I got I'ma give it all I got
[01:52.26]All I got yeah
[01:53.72]I gave it all I got I'ma give it all I got
[01:58.32]Yeah I gave it all I got
[02:02.82]I gave it all I got I'ma give it all I got
[02:06.80]I'ma give it all I got
[02:12.22]I bet you I bet you on everything I love
[02:17.98]You can't get no n***a to try me in the city
[02:22.97]'Cause I am not playin' that for the twenty-one
[02:27.06]All that all that over
[02:29.33]Lil' boy a*s scared I'm a grown a*s man
[02:31.69]I do not play no games with nobody right
[02:37.05]I tell you try me
[02:39.70]I'ma handle my business right
[02:41.69]Try me I'ma handle my business
[02:44.21]I don't care to you we is with it
[02:48.01]I don't care what neighborhood they from
[02:51.16]When it ain't
[02:52.28]I go on any corner
[02:54.13]I do whatever I wanna when I wanna
[02:58.43]You f**k with me your a*s is a goner
[03:01.92]And I travel solo by myself all the time
[03:06.62]I ain't never had to have no security none of that
[03:10.83]'Cause I am that guy
data.trans:
[ti:All I Got]
[ar:Rod Wave]
[al:SoulFly (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.18]//
[00:00.36]//
[00:10.53]低了 低了 调高音量
[00:21.72]看着
[00:21.93]Mook 让音符跳动
[00:23.13]//
[00:23.65]凌晨六点 他在跟恶魔搏斗
[00:26.05]最近 我没有时间睡觉
[00:29.38]这些家伙毫无理由就记恨我
[00:31.53]我祈祷等我离开的时候能成功复仇
[00:34.10]我付出了我得到的所有
[00:35.66]开着敞篷汽车四处兜风
[00:37.44]告诉他们管他们想什么 我没兴趣知道
[00:39.50]去告诉他们我说
[00:40.90]去他的世界 就像我爸爸说的
[00:43.20]这样的暴徒生活 就像Pac说过的 就像Pac说过的
[00:47.08]想想我的兄弟 C
[00:49.03]他二十年时间都呆在牢里
[00:52.65]我不会说谎 我会因此丧命
[00:54.90]无数回忆 生命会在2053年结束
[00:58.56]这必须停止
[00:59.15]这些家伙像吊扇一样忙个不停
[01:01.36]把枪支的弹匣卸下
[01:03.34]子弹总是卡住
[01:04.40]告诉过他们我会成功 
[01:05.34]现在我们被锁在家里 可我并不在乎
[01:07.59]并不在乎
[01:10.90]告诉我你要跟我说些什么 我保证
[01:12.55]但是不要碰我 因为这些年轻人
[01:13.92]不会跟我打打闹闹 都是真刀真枪决斗
[01:16.40]我日日都有美人在怀
[01:18.55]要跟我搏斗的家伙 会被我放倒在地
[01:21.82]想想我那些在路上的兄弟
[01:24.93]跟他们一路同行直到送回家里
[01:26.33]这就是我得到的所有
[01:28.27]要知道不管如何 我跟我的兄弟们在一起
[01:30.81]和这些家伙一起 永远保持真实
[01:32.18]你知道我们都会陪伴彼此
[01:33.62]我没有如他们所料的失败
[01:36.27]他们还想从我这里得到什么
[01:37.98]我付出了我得到的所有
[01:39.56]从十七岁起就在不停追逐
[01:41.61]年轻人终于梦想成真
[01:43.44]我会付出我得到的所有
[01:45.83]我会付出我得到的所有
[01:47.95]我会付出我得到的所有
[01:52.26]我得到的所有
[01:53.72]我付出了我得到的所有 我会付出我得到的所有
[01:58.32]我付出了我得到的所有
[02:02.82]我付出了我得到的所有 我会付出我得到的所有
[02:06.80]我会付出我得到的所有
[02:12.22]我跟你打赌 赌上我爱的所有
[02:17.98]你在这座城市找不到人来挑战我
[02:22.97]因为我不是在儿戏
[02:27.06]都结束了
[02:29.33]毛头小子没有勇气 我已经是个成熟的大人了
[02:31.69]我没有跟任何人玩笑 对吗
[02:37.05]我跟你说了 来挑战我
[02:39.70]我把我的事业搞得风生水起
[02:41.69]来挑战我 我在忙我的工作
[02:44.21]我不在乎你如何如何 我们可以一分高下
[02:48.01]我不在乎街坊邻居背景多么显赫
[02:51.16]不是我投降的时候
[02:52.28]我可以去到任何角落
[02:54.13]我只会随心所欲做我想做的
[02:58.43]你要跟我作对 那你怕是小命难保
[03:01.92]我独自旅行 一直都是这样
[03:06.62]我永远都不需要安保 一个都不需要
[03:10.83]因为我就是那样洒脱的家伙
